CustomField.description: This field is used to keep the Primary address of Related Business.
CustomField.formula: IF((Related_Business__r.ShippingStreet == null && Related_Business__r.ShippingCity == null && Related_Business__r.ShippingState == null && Related_Business__r.ShippingPostalCode == null && Related_Business__r.ShippingCountry == null), '', Related_Business__r.ShippingStreet +' '+ Related_Business__r.ShippingCity +', '+ Related_Business__r.ShippingState +' '+ Related_Business__r.ShippingPostalCode +' '+ Related_Business__r.ShippingCountry)
CustomField.label: Related Business Primary Address
